author: Noelle Buhidar
title: National Margarita Day Specials - Two words: Drink up!
text:
National Margarita Day Specials Two words: Drink up! National Margarita Day Specials Two words: Drink up! 
February 22 might be just another Wednesday, but at least it’s one that comes with a treat. I’m talking about tequila, y’all. It’s National Margarita Day! And whether you prefer your drinks frozen or on the rocks, you’re going to be able to sip on some sweet specials. Below, are some of the National Margarita Day deals RetailMeNot has seen, so go get your party on and remember: It’s 5 o’clock somewhere! Restaurants Celebrating National Margarita Day
